project.name: SpludoCoreDb
project.description: Spludo Core Database Build-Targets, should be included in a project specific build.xml!

target.name: db:bootstrap
target.description: Load the fixtures and execute pending migrations.

target.name: db:migrate
target.description: Execute all pending migrations and create a structure dump.

target.name: db:structure:dump
target.description: Dump the current database structure to a structure dump.

target.name: db:structure:load
target.description: Load the current database structure from a structure dump.

target.name: db:fixtures:dump
target.description: Dump the current database as fixtures.

target.name: db:fixtures:load
target.description: Load the fixtures into the database structure.
